content: ग {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (Used only at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Who or what goes, going, moving, being, staying, remaining, having sexual intercourse with &c. --गः {@--1@} A Gandharva. {@--2@} An epithet of Gaṇeśa. {@--3@} A long syllable (used as an abbreviation of गुरु), (in prosody). --गा, --गं A song.
